0: They are plush comfortable clean and always refreshed
The restaurant has been updated and it is bar is now reachable through the lobby which is a real place

Large spacious rooms newly updated bathrooms with separate shower and deep soaking tubs free internet and staff that absolutely bend over backward to be helpful this is just a wonderful place to stay smack dab in the center of the action
Updates have modernized the rooms making them very comfortable and well appointed
Beautiful decor reminds me of growing up overseas and everything was nicely updated and very clean
The Talbot Hotel was built in 1927 and has been recently renovated in keeping its historic charm while offering all the modern amenities one would expect
This is an old hotel recently beautifully renovated and decorated in the heart of Chicago an easy walk for nearly everything
Everything was clean and updated and the rooms more than spacious for the 4 of us
The rooms were spacious with all amenities and lovely updated sparkling clean bathrooms
I have stayed there several times and have always found the rooms to be clean and updated
1: Still kept it is old charm with modern updates
However was told by hotel staff that there will be renovation soon
I do not think it needs to be renovated
Property will start a 14 million renovation in 2017
2: Checked in first day after 4 month remodel
2 night stay in newly renovated hotel
even though the hotel just reopened from a complete renovation they forgot to renovate their employees politeness
Renovations have made an already excellent hotel even better
For someone who never experienced the old charm of the hotel pre renovation my wife and I absolutely loved our stay from check in to check out
We did not like the newly renovated modern design
lots of very good with a few minor not so goods housekeeping while they make a fine bed and consistently refresh towels if the carpet was vacuumed it did not look like it

This was my first stay at the Talbot since their refresh over a year ago and while I could not immediately identify what was done other than the great outdoor patio for al fresco dining and drinking I think that is new
they have done a great job updating the hotel
While it has been udpated it retains the character of an older hotel
3: The Talbot has been my favorite hotel in Chicago though this was my first stay after their change in ownership and room renovations
I waited very patiently while The Talbot Hotel was under renovation what a wonderful experience
The renovations to the rooms are lovely
The rooms have been updated and are spacious for the city also quite affordable compared to other hotels
The hotel has been recently updated which we loved but has not lost it is boutique style charm and great personal service
Location is great and the Hotel is newly remodeled with an intimate bar and bistro area
UPDATE I have since spoken with Chris the director of Front Office at The Talbot
Great location but renovation and elevator problems
The property is immaculate and the remodel is roomy with no wasted space
